SMS_SendTXTSMS: select txt_tval,txt_val,txt_bcc from {{schema}}.txt where txt_process='SMS' and txt_attrib=@txt_attrib
X_SMLW_TOP: select case when @cur_sm_id_auto <> 0 then @cur_sm_id_auto else (select top 1 sm_id_auto from {{schema}}.sm where 1=1 order by sm_utype desc,coalesce(SM.sm_seq,SM.sm_id),sm_name,SM.sm_id) end as sm_id_auto from {{schema}}.dual
X_SMLW_INSERT: where coalesce(sm_seq,sm_id) > (select coalesce(sm_seq,sm_id) from {{schema}}.sm where sm_id=@sm_id_parent)
and sm_utype = (select sm_utype from {{schema}}.sm where sm_id=@sm_id_parent)

and cast((coalesce(sm_seq,sm_id)-(select coalesce(sm_seq,sm_id) from {{schema}}.sm where sm_id=@sm_id_parent)) as decimal)/(select count(*) from {{schema}}.sm sm2 where coalesce(sm2.sm_seq,sm2.sm_id) > (select coalesce(sm_seq,sm_id) from {{schema}}.sm where sm_id=@sm_id_parent) and coalesce(sm2.sm_seq,sm2.sm_id) <= coalesce(sm.sm_seq,sm.sm_id))<=1.0;
select (select max(sm_id)+1 from {{schema}}.SM),sm_id,sm_utype,coalesce(sm_seq,sm_id)+1,@sm_name,@sm_desc,'ACTIVE' from {{schema}}.SM where sm_id=@sm_id_parent;
X_SMLW_LOV: select sm_id as codeid,sm_id_parent as codeparentid,sm_id_auto as codeval,sm_desc as codetxt,'folder' as codeicon from {{schema}}.sm where 1=1 %%%DATALOCKS%%% order by sm_utype desc,coalesce(SM.sm_seq,SM.sm_id),sm_name,SM.sm_id
JSHARMONY_FACTORY_INSTALLED: select case when isnull((select count(*) from information_schema.columns where table_name = 'dual' and table_schema='{{schema}}'),0) > 0 then 1 else 0 end jsharmony_factory_installed
